item.title: Wooden laminate and caroet dumped, 2nd November
item.description:
Opposite Esmeralda Rd junction next to bus stop. Lots of detritus dumped, could it be removed please? Thank you

item.title: Smashed and Abandoned, 2nd November
item.description:
Tgis vehicle was Smashed and Abandoned here many months ago and is clearly Nothing road worthy or Legal for driving; and is taking up a B zone space that many others here need badly; bcoz in B zone it is as bad as it gets to find somewhere to park at the very best of times. I've been having to park next to Madame Tussaurds some nights and over near Notting Hill Gate on others; bcoz tnete6is nowhere to park anywhere near PENFOLD STREET NW8 NW1, and I'm having to walk back at 6 effin AM in the morning; bcoz of idiots like this one. HK67 MUW Parked directly in front of the KSA school. SIX MONTHS IT IS; SIX. PLEASE GETTING RID OF IT; PLEASE.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-25, Penfold Street, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Irish traveller aggressive dog chihuahua left off lead roaming around attacking members a public.Insistent dog barking and attack on a passer by.We are experiencing persistent dog barking as residents of the neighbouring community near Palace Close, being woken up late at night. C. 22:20, the small dog (chihuahua) was roaming on Chapman Road no leash and yelped on the road and nearly bit a passerby, 2nd November
item.description:
Irish travellers letting their dogs roam off lead attacking people. Also criminals operating at this location. Vehicle cloning,stolen vehicles. ASB
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chapman Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Late night events taking place at the bath house. Loud music large crowds urinating in surrounding streets and up residence cars. Antisocial behaviour public orders offence. Drunk and disorderly., 2nd November
item.description:
Antisocial behaviour, public orders. Large gatherings events at the bath house need to be organised and extra volunteers properly run and maintained. Causing distress to surrounding residents.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eastway, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
